attributes.action: Keep the London 2012 Olympics logo OFF Edinburgh Castle
attributes.additional_details: Keep Edinburgh Castle Ramparts free of any logo's advertising the London 2012 Olympics

rejection.details:
Any advertising on the Edinburgh Castle ramparts would ultimately be a matter for 'Historic Scotland', who manage the Castle.

I should add that responsibility for all aspects of staging the Games, including advertising, is that of the London Organising Committee of the Olympic and Paralympic Games (LOCOG) who are a private organisation operating independently of Government.

LOCOG can be contacted by writing to: London 2012, One Churchill Place, Canary Wharf, London E14 5LN; Tel: 0203 2012 000; or email: enquiries@london2012.com.
